text: Heinz Cattani (1908–2001) was a Swiss bobsledder who competed from the late 1930s to the late 1940s. He won a gold medals in the four-man event at the FIBT World Championships, earning it in 1939. ==References== *Bobsleigh four- man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:1908 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Swiss male bobsledders
title: Heinz Cattani
